resources.string:
New in v0.8.1:
* Fixed issue with save/create button falling offscreen when having large entries
* Added option to only show titles
* Added "use title as value" option

New in v0.8:
* New UI
* Entry titles
* Password support
* Themes

Features you can expect over the coming weeks:
* Backup/Restore method
* Group management
* Quickcopy inputmethod/keyboard

This free version is ad-supported. A paid version will appear on the Android market very soon.
